name: Dragooned
description:
Dragooned is a single player pick-up-and-play action game with 40 playable characters that have very different playstyles and a variety of modes, including advancing through procedurally generated levels with a party of characters, facing down endless onslaughts of enemies and undertaking a variety of challenges.

The differing character abilities allow for a vast range of playstyles, from basic offensive, defensive, speedy and projectile focuses to summoning, aerial combat, area control, status effects, knockback, counterattacks, stealth, teleportation and even more advanced playstyles beyond.

Purchasing this content entitles you to both the PS4™ system and “PS Vita” system versions!

1 player
